root.name: Deadfall Adventures
root.description: OverviewDeadfall Adventures is an action adventure first person shooter inspired by classic adventure movies like the Indiana Jones films. Other inspirations include the Tomb Raider and Uncharted games but the developers at The Farm 51 chose not to include platforming elements in the game, instead focusing on exploration and a return to classic FPS gameplay.
